# The pound-sign (#) is used as a comment character

wps http://kdl1.cache.wps.com/ksodl/download/linux/a21//wps-office_10.1.0.5707~a21_amd64.deb
wps-fonts http://repo.debiancn.org/pool/main/w/wps-office-fonts/wps-office-fonts_1.0_all.deb
TeamViewer https://download.teamviewer.com/download/linux/teamviewer_amd64.deb
